title: Java StringtoCharArray()Method

metadata.description: Learn about Java StringtoCharArray()Method with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Convert a string to a
char
array:
String myStr = "Hello";
char[] myArray = myStr.toCharArray();
System.out.println(myArray[0]);

Definition and Usage
The
toCharArray()
method returns a new
char
array representing the contents of the string.
Syntax
public char[] toCharArray()
Technical Details
Java version:
Any

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers Java StringtoCharArray()Method concepts and techniques.
